name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Legendary Edition
name_original: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Legendary Edition
description:
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Legendary Edition is an adventure-RPG game developed by Bethesda Game Studios. It was originally released in 2013. Bethesda Softworks published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Legendary Edition has a score of 94. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Legendary Edition on PC, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
